question_text: What is the primary difference between DVI single link and DVI dual link?
answer_options: Dual link supports audio, single link does not
Single link is analog-only, dual link is digital-only
Dual link supports higher resolutions than single link
Single link includes a locking mechanism
correct_answer: Dual link supports higher resolutions than single link
explanation: DVI dual link includes more pins and bandwidth, allowing support for higher video resolutions.
